title: 6 game breaking Yasuo bugs, some 1 year old.
body:
Hi,

I would like to report the following six bugs and would appreciate it if a riot employee replied and shed some light on if and when these bugs will be fixed.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Yasuo Auto Attack bug after Last Breath: ** 

After using Last Breath, Yasuo stops auto attacking the target and even if you command him to attack by right clicking on the target, he just stands there for a short period of 1 sec without auto attacking.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c6hipRWEBgQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ov5vMPEriVA

NOTE: This auto attack bug also seems to randomly happen when you E-Q, but it doesn’t happen as often and regularly as with Last Breath.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Yasuo Steel Tempest bug after Last Breath:**

After using Last Breath, similar to how it blocks you out from Auto Attacking, it also blocks out the damage from Steel Tempest, you can use Steel Tempest, it goes on cooldown, but it doesn’t register any damage or a stack from gathering storm.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9NkUE9dob7o 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Yasuo Tornado Q increased cooldown bug:**

After hitting your second Q, which grants you enough stacks of gathering storm and turns your Q in to a Tornado Q, the cooldown is slightly increased before you can use that tornado Q.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uyufBHys5js

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Yasuo edge of E-Q combo bug:**

When you use E-Q combo and hit enemy units, at the outer part of the ability they will still be knocked up, but take no damage.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9DsODnzKzRs 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKWCu9FKCLE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rLkMr7bJ9JY

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

~~Steel Tempest blind bug:~~

~~When you are blinded, Steel Tempest misses, while it is not an auto attack or an “empowered auto attack”. The changes to blind in pre-season patch 5.22 didn’t include Steel Tempest in the “these will now be affected by blind” list, take a look at it for yourself: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes#patch-systems ~~

~~Also, Steel Tempest used to go through blind, read the ability detail section: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Yasuo~~

~~Steel Tempest is a skill shot ability; this is not working as intended.~~

EDIT: NVM, working as intended.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

~~Steel Tempest dodge bug:~~

~~When Jax uses Counter Strike, your Steel Tempest will be dodged, while it is not an auto attack or an “empowered auto attack”. The changes to dodge in pre-season patch 5.22 didn’t include Steel Tempest in the “these will now be affected by dodge” list, take a look at it for yourself: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes#patch-systems~~

~~Also, Steel Tempest used to go through dodge, read the ability detail section: http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Yasuo~~

~~Steel Tempest is a skill shot ability; this is not working as intended.~~

EDIT: NVM, working as intended.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I hope a riot employee responds, I understand that not replying doesn’t mean a bug report is ignored, but I would like to get some information, because some of these Yasuo bugs are 1 year old!

Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Yo,

1) Q being dodgeable and missable while blind is intended.
2) Q3 Cooldown bug, I think I have a fix.
3) Aa / Q after Last Breath: need to look into it.

~Exgeniar.

Hello Riot Exgeniar, thank you for your reply.

I will suggest you try to reproduce the following bugs with Berserker Greaves + Shiv so your Steel Tempest has a 1.33 sec cooldown.

Q bug after Last Breath:

1. Get tornado Q.
2. Stand pretty far away from your target, so when you use Q, it travels and your Q cooldown starts dropping.
3. Then use your ultimate when target is knocked up.
4. Now mid ultimate animation, your Q should be ready for use again, when you slam the target down with your ult, simultanously use Q. 
5. If done fast enough, Q animation wil go off, but it won't do damage nor grant a stack of gathering storm, but it will go on cooldown.

AA bug after Last Breath:

1. Get tornado Q (have auto attack on and right click on target, before or after using Q)
2. Use it on target to knock them up (try both methods, standard Q from distance and E-Q combo)
3. Use ultimate, do not move after ult, tell your target to not move either.
4. After Yasuo does his ultimate animation and arrives at the ground, he stands there for 1 sec, not auto attacking.
5. When you are in the air and slam the target down or even after it, you can try to right click on target again, he still won't auto attack for 0.5-1 sec.

I will make videos about these bugs if needed, but not now, later today.

Also, you didn't comment on the E-Q bug when you have a tornado Q ready. The outer part of the circle knocks targets up, but doesn't deal damage. Take a look at the caster minion in this video, gets knocked up, doesn't take damage: 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9DsODnzKzRs

Now, which part of this is a bug, I am not sure, it is for you guys to decide based on the range of that ability combo. Either the minion shouldn't be knocked up, or if it is knocked up, it should take damage.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GuGhiGoh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-28T13:01:59.439+0000)
>
> Yo,
> 
> 1) Q being dodgeable and missable while blind is intended.
> 2) Q3 Cooldown bug, I think I have a fix. 
> 3) Aa / Q after Last Breath: need to look into it.
> 
> ~Exgeniar.

Can Confirm The AA/Q after last Breath

In the meantime if you move a little right after you ulti everything is fine. Just make a move command before auto/q
Noted. That's important to know. Thanks
Probably. Sounds unfair.
When was this change made? I didn't see any notes of it in the patch notes and I recall Steel Tempest being allowed to be used during Last Breath for at least 1-1.5 years after Yasuo's release.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/iAHQz0GW-gameplay-so-its-been-over-a-year-and-tfs-w-can-still-pass-through-yasuos-windwall?comment=000000010001

Can you please look into some of the other inconsistencies with yasuo windwall. 

Would be nice to know what it works on and what it doesn't.

Copy Pasted from my old post on the subject :  

1) Non-creature objects with travel speeds are stopped by windwall

2) if it goes off screen it gets a pass...

3) Naut ult is an exception.

So creature objects should get through? ones like...
maokai sapling
fizz chum the waters
azir soldiers
zed living shadow
hecarim ult ghosts
...because they don't.

Non creature objects that have travel speeds (and don't go off screen) that should be stopped like ...
syndra toss
ekko parallel convergence
... but they don't.

Or that ground based projectiles get stopped like ...
Aatrox's blades of torment
braum's glacial fissure
Naut rip tide
Zyra grasping roots
Poppies new ult
Naut Depth charge * (the listed exception)
VelKoz Tectonic disruption * (also an exception, the visuals are destroyed but the ability goes through)
... as long as you remember the exceptions.

It's ok, item projectiles are all blocked like ...
mikails crucible
talisman
fotm passive
botrk active *
... one of these things is not like the other.

At least ranged auto attacks are consistent being blocked ...
Azir soldiers
Kayle after using Righteous fury
Thresh
Vel'Koz
Viktor after firing Siphon Power
TF pick a card empowered attacks (only some of them i think)
... but they don't. I can almost understand Thresh and Vel because their attacks are part of them, but then Zyra would need an exception too because her AA are her whipping her vines on her hands and drawing them back just like them.

But effects with no travel time get through consistently ...
Lee Sin cripple (Cripple is a point blank autotargeted debuff)
lulu whimsy (a zero travel time targeted ability)
...with a few exceptions.

Champions are allowed through...
blitz grab
tahm tongue
...but i guess not all parts of all champions are created equally.

At least when orianna ball interacts with windwall it always does the same thing. it stops there. except if you try to move it through windwall it stops and drops, but if you try to shield an ally and the ball hits the windwall the ball immediately returns to ori because of course it does.

Speaking of player summoned units like ori ball, olaf axe is stopped in place, while thresh lantern is destroyed. Why the difference here?

The exceptions to this ability know no bounds.

Meanwhile braum shield works by its own set of rules entirely where AOE effects still hit braum and his nearby allies, projectiles are no longer projectiles for his shield...
Lux shield
Draven axes
Leona zenith blade
Jinx rockets (first one damage mitigation but gets full AOE anyway)
Nami bubble
Cass miasma
Mundo cleavers
... why are these no longer projectiles?

But Braum shield does block non projectiles like...
VelKoz Ult
Lux Ult
Cho Rupture (blocked from center of ability not from cho)
... why? Who knows?

With your three simple rules and all these exceptions memorized you too can understand what "projectiles" are, but remember, they are different for different walls.

EDIT: formatting + links for reference -
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Yasuo/Projectiles
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Braum

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Exgeniar,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GuGhiGoh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-28T13:01:59.439+0000)
>
> Yo,
> 
> 1) Q being dodgeable and missable while blind is intended.
> 2) Q3 Cooldown bug, I think I have a fix. 
> 3) Aa / Q after Last Breath: need to look into it.
> 
> ~Exgeniar.

Thanks for looking into this. With Yasuo being my go to champion beyond Zed I find it frustrating I can't have a fluent gameplay experience with him, namely the can't AA after last breath or E/Q. With that being said, has anyone used the PROJECT: Yasuo skin and feel that it isn't as smooth going as his classic/High Noon Skin? It feels slower and clunky when compared to his classic(for me at least) and I feel myself choosing classic over PROJECT solely for this reason. Anyone else feel this?

Ok, this is getting a little ridiculous now, I mean I have waited patiently for over a year now for someone at riot games to fix these bugs. Time and time again a Riot employee has said hey we'll look into them, I immediately think "oh yay progress!" three months after this has been posted here there have been no updates no evidence of bugs fixed in any patch and it's just like come on man. Like I understand fixing bugs in a game isn't a simple task but one full year now, for 6 simple bugs. Yes, league community I am getting salty because this is long waited too long now.{{champion:157}}

Is there a chance you can look into Jayce as well? There are so many bugs that I have seen on him now. Sometimes his jump won't allow him to jump over terrain, he just jumps, spins and place, and then falls back down. Other times, Jayce's shockblast fails to explode and grant vision. In addition, sometimes if you fire at a monster, vision isn't granted at all, and you can't jump to the monster as a result (or a person on the other side of terrain).

Oh good!
Exactly what we need, effective Yasuo buffs
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BlmMUvoIQAAedfG.jpg
dude, these are bugfixes.

Bugfixes that EFFECTIVELY BUFF HIM.

"EFFECTIVE YASUO BUFFS"

Like I know you people play Yasuo, but you must still have enough of a brain to read properly..... right?
imagine being this much of a madbad that you have to cry foul over a champion's kit actually working properly

It boggles my mind how these idiots here want a champion to stay bugged because they hate them.  That's completely ridiculous.

Wanting a champion to be nerfed extremely hard because their kit is toxic,  I understand, but it being literally broken is not the way to do it.
this is your brain on bronze, kids
im pretty sure any and all bugfixes to any champion will "effectively buff" them as you called it

> [{quoted}](name=Pledgie,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=GuGhiGoh,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2016-02-28T14:14:34.304+0000)
>
> im pretty sure any and all bugfixes to any champion will "effectively buff" them as you called it

"We fixed a bug where X was doing too much damage."

{{champion:86}}  "Fixed a minor mistake in which his damage was scaling on his own health and not his targets"

best one i remember. good times.....

Its been said before but i have to comment on something as idiotic as you just said, its a bug, its not effectively buffing him its making it to where he works as intended by riot, there is nothing wrong with bug fixes on any champion, i hope you were joking because this is just another level that i wasnt ready for yet on LOL. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Ok, let's be fair here.

it IS an effective buff. Like when Rumble's flamespitter didn't work properly so they buffed the fuck out of its damage, then they made it work properly and Rumble was the most broken top laner in the game for a while. That bugfix was an effective buff, and, depending on the severity of the bug, it can be a huge effective buff.

HOWEVER, if a bugfix would give an effective buff to a champion, then Riot should just fix the bug and nerf the champion afterwards if a nerf is necessary. A champ shouldn't have to have bugs in their kit.

But they aren't changing any numbers. Well they shouldn't. That's not required for yas's kit to work properly. Unless a nerf is deserved afterward. There should be 0 number changes. They aren't buffing damage from any single spell or aa. Just making it to where his kit goes off like it's suppose to.

It doesn't matter that they're not directly changing any numbers. If they fix these bugs, Yasuo will land more Q's that deal damage than he normally would. Yasuo will hit with more abilities and will deal more damage.

If a champion had a bug where every other time they used an ability it did no damage, fixing that bug would double their damage output without changing any numbers. Same principle applies here.

But, like I said, champions shouldn't have bugs in their kits. Yasuo should get these bugs fixed, but it's important to remember that fixing these bugs is a minor buff to him and may mean he needs a small nerf afterwards.

Uh ok. These are bugs but these are NOT gamebreaking bugs.

A gamebreaking bug is something like the Rengar EW interaction where Rengar could toss out bolas infinitely. That completely broke the game and made him S+++++ tier.  Aatrox becoming invisible after Q is also a gamebreaker. 

Yasuo having a bug where his Q might not come out isn't gamebreaking. It's unfortunate but it's certainly not so bad that he warps the entire game because of it.
In my opinion these bugs are gamebreaking for Yasuo, because I miss at least 1 kill every game because of one of these bugs. 1 kill means a lot, especially at higher mmr competitive games.

We have very different  definitions of 'game-breaking' . 
When I say something that's 'game-breaking' , it's probably something that we are going to disable a champion and start a redeploy train on.
With that said, these bugs are definitely power impacting, and are considered major defects to competitive players.
I see, thanks for clearing that up. Power impacting it is.
Again, still not gamebreaking. Sucks, it could mean a loss, but it doesn't completely break the game.
Yes, you are right.
I've honestly lost out on probably 100 kills over the 1000 or so games I've played Yasuo because of these bugs. It makes a pretty significant different.

Significant =/= Gamebreaking.

Gamebreaking, again, would be "After pressing R and then doing a little dance at your keyboard, Yasuo's next Q hits everyone on the map" or "Instantly has 3 stacks". I'm not disparaging that the bug isn't a big deal (In this case yeah, it is) but it's certainly not to the point of breaking the game.
Honestly this post needs more upvotes i thought i was crazy when i tried yasuo for the first time and noticed a couple of these right off the bat.

Also, when I ult, occasionally I stay on the spot of where I ulted without traveling to the enemy. This bug has allowed me to kill someone under tower without actually taking any damage from the turret and in other times it has allowed the enemy to escape.
Last Breath positioning you out of turret range if possible is working as intended.
It doesn't work for me several times >.< I need to learn the conditions for it to happen.

It will place you just outside of turret range as long as they are close enough to the edge. If they're closer to the tower rather than the edge of ita range it'll just put you right on them as usual.
Ok, thank you for the infos :)

I knew it that i wasn't bad , it's just Yasuo who deals no damage after ult , and i was dumb enough to not see this.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

thanks so much for making this post dude. Yasuo has been like this for way too long and makes him feel clunky to play a lot. Sometimes I even lose games because of these (especially the attacking after ult thing.)
Oh My God finally someone addressed that issue for the Q tornado being delayed... its really annoying when u can't use it

If bug 1 and 2 are common bug, I imagine that any fix will boost his damage output in a fight by quite a lot (aka breaking the balance) and probably will lead to future power adjustment in his kit.

As I find him pretty ok now, I would prefer that bug to become normal for him (at least for the Q)
I've played Yasuo since his release and I'd rather have his kit and gameplay be bug free and smooth, if he needs power adjustments after these bug fixes, so be it.

that doesn't makes sense. So what you are saying is that yasuo's Q should remain as is and DO NO DAMAGE AND GO ON COOLDOWN after being used? Imagine your favorite champion, now imagine every time you use your q or ult after using you E or W (or whatever ability) that it does no damage and goes on cooldown.

It's just some though, if no damage q is a very common thing now, maybe it's better to make him unable to use Q (removing the bug and the unfair cd) right after is R than just bugfix it and nerf him hard after just because of the amounth of damage he gain from it.

We saw some champ be nerf for less than that, as I find him balanced atm, I fear random powershift
So now you're basically suggesting yasuo silences himself after he ults. 1 extra Q that he should already have will not make him op.

don't know exactly the damage of a late game yasuo Q but, from memory, it's a lot

I know poeple don't like to think in that way but that's only logic, if you add a good amounth of damage (and easy to land) to a champion who manage to be succesfull without it, you increase his overall damage output during a game and that will lead to futur nerf.

I don't really mind in the end as I don't play him but, if he happens to go out of the line once again despise being balance now, I will probably start to ban him once again (yasuo main already had the "always ban" era, don't think they need a second one :s)
Yo my boy thank you for this post.
